page.title: 17Education
page.content: ln Broadwindsor school there is a field. There is a big hall to have assembly and lunch.There is a swimming pool down the bottom of the school.Behind the swimming pool there is our school garden for class three, we plant flowers and vegtables.There is a large net ball court for the net ball players to play on.There is a long jump court with a sand pit(we use it for high jump as well)We have a paddie tenis court to play on.I like Broadwindsor school because the work is good and itis big and large and I think the swimming pool is best.
